page.title: 13Communications
page.content: Trains are used to move from place to place. The local train service goes from Altrincham through Sale to Manchester. It takes 2 minutes to get from Altrincham to Navigation Road. It takes 6 minutes to get from Altrincham to Timperley. It takes 7 minutes to get from Altrincham to Brooklands. From Altrincham to Sale it takes 9 minutes. The trains which run on Mondays to Fridays run 90 times a day to different places around the area. On Saturdays the trains run to the same places but there are fewer of them. This is because more people travel to Manchester during the week. The trains are electric. It costs 80p single to Manchester and 25p (child) return to Altrincham from Sale.
